title: Cannabis Is a Global Phenomenon With Chris Naprawa, Khiron Life Sciences
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Chris Naprawa is President at Khiron Life Sciences. Chris joins Rena Sherbill to discuss Khiron's focus on Latin America and beyond and its plans for growth, including partnerships and acquisitions. They also discuss global deregulation, Khiron's recent equity offerings and the benefits of having a former President on its board. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
